sub_fields.label: Full Screen Video?
sub_fields.name: full_screen_video
sub_fields.instructions: Turn on so video isn't scaled, but actually fill up 100% viewport.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: bg_color
sub_fields.instructions: Choose background color. Add opacity to become overlay over video if available.

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: txt_color
sub_fields.instructions: Choose background color. Add opacity to become overlay over video if available.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: bg_color
sub_fields.instructions: Turn on for gradient background color.

sub_fields.label: Link Left
sub_fields.name: link_left
sub_fields.instructions: Add link in left top text box.

sub_fields.label: Link Right
sub_fields.name: link_right
sub_fields.instructions: Add link in right bottom text box.

sub_fields.label: Value Above Text
sub_fields.name: above_text
sub_fields.instructions: Check the button if you want value to be above the text.

sub_fields.label: Second Steps Style?
sub_fields.name: steps_style
sub_fields.instructions: Check button to chose second steps styles.

sub_fields.label: Background Video?
sub_fields.name: bg_video
sub_fields.instructions: Check the button if you want background to be video.

sub_fields.label: Reduce Width?
sub_fields.name: reduce_width
sub_fields.instructions: Check button if you want to reduce testimonial width.

sub_fields.label: Left?
sub_fields.name: left
sub_fields.instructions: Check the button if you want title to be left aligned.

sub_fields.label: Case Study
sub_fields.name: case_study_feature
sub_fields.instructions: Choose one case study to show on page.

sub_fields.label: Case Studies
sub_fields.name: case_studies_feature
sub_fields.instructions: Choose case studies to show on page.

sub_fields.label: Video Title
sub_fields.name: video_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom video title to show on page.

sub_fields.label: Custom Link
sub_fields.name: custom_link
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom link to show on page.

sub_fields.label: Instruction
sub_fields.message: You can change global configuration at global modules.

sub_fields.label: Custom Title
sub_fields.name: custom_title
sub_fields.instructions: You can overwrite default title here.

sub_fields.label: Share links?
sub_fields.name: share_links
sub_fields.instructions:
By default, it will show global social links.
Select this button to show Share links instead.
